name: Pong Spectrum by Entikai
description:
My very first game, Pong Spectrum! 

Made as a practice project, it adds a small twist to the original pong. I completed this game on 27th of September 2020 and I've worked on it for a couple of days in my free time.

The main point of this game was to make myself spend some time in the Unity editor and practice using all the features. And it definitely payed off since I've learned a few things while making this.
